author: Adam Stephens
comment: It's garbage on Huawei watch. The hands are small and off center. The middle area is micro small and to the side. Totally unusable and Android Wear crashes when selecting out of it to another watch face.
title: Doesn't work on Huawei watch

author: William Marshall
comment: I have installed and reinstalled it  about 10 times.   The results are always the same... the white hand is not centered, thus it is impossible to read the date.   I have emailed the developer asking for help.  I have received a very prompt reply from him... he has offered to return my money and he says that he is working on the problem.   I did not accept the refund.   The problem remains...
title: Huawei Watch... the app is useless

author: James Barkman
comment: After promises of updates that never came, and incompatibility with the Huawei Watch, makes this a developer I won't be buying from again
title: Disappointing

author: Kenny Honeycutt
comment: It looks great but hard to read at a glance... Date is even harder
title: Looks great

author: Chas Stokes
comment: Really like the look of the face. Would prefer the US date format instead of European. To be honest I didn't realize the 'odometer' was the date at first.
title: Nice

author: Dave T
comment: I like the different look to this face as well as the fact that it's not cartooney looking. Great job.  Would love to see options to configure colors and date format. Thanks!

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Thankyou Dave for your feedback!
Configurable options, will be coming in the next release. Stay tunned!
Best

title: Great looking!

author: Jake Guevara
comment: What excited as the face fits my personality. But does not work on on LG urbane 2

author: Houston Pillay
comment: Works well on my LG Watch R. The car enthusiasts watch face!
title: Awesome!

author: Oriol Mercadé
comment: It reminds me of a Ferrary's gauge =DD I'd like to have more variations on this, please keep on doing more!
title: I love this Sportish watchface!

author: Peter Baldauf
comment: Too bad, as this is my favorite design early Porsche 'green gauge' style.  Please fix an I will purchase again.
title: Huawei incompatible

author: Bryan R.
comment: Watch face is not centered on Moto 360 2nd gen. There are no settings options. Avoid this
title: Poor implementation

author: Cono E
comment: Does not center properly on Moto  360 2nd gen
title: Not centered

author: Abietyasakti Kinasih
comment: Minute hand and date counter are not centered.

author: iwan sant
comment: Titik jarum dan tanggal Tidak pas di tengah
title: Kurang presisi untuk moto 360 2nd 46mm

author: Abdulla Hamad
title: مش راكب صح في ساعة هواوي
